tool_description: An API that allows users to view short excerpts of Halsey's songs.
title: Halsey Lyric Snippets

api_list.name: album by {id}
api_list.description: returns album information when searched by {id}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com/album/id/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: song by {id}
api_list.description: returns song when searched by id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com/song/id/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: random song & song's album information out of {artist}
api_list.description: Returns album information and random song information
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com/{artist}/song/random/info"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: random song out of {artist}
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves a random song by the specified artist and returns it in the response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com/{artist}/song/random"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: specified {song}
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves the specified song by name and returns it in the response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com/song/{song}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: all songs from {artist}
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves all songs by the specified artist and returns them in the response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com/{artist}/song"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: random song from a specific {artist} and specified {album}
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves a random song from the specified album by the specified artist and returns it in the response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com/{artist}/album/{album}/song/random"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: all songs from a specified {artist} and specified {album}
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves all songs from the specified album by the specified artist and returns them in the response.
api_list.code:

url = "https://halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com/{artist}/album/{album}/song"

    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: specified {album} information from {artist}
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves the specified album by the specified artist and returns it in the response.

api_list.name: all albums from {artist}
api_list.description:
This endpoint retrieves all albums by the specified artist and returns them in the response.
Use "Halsey" for Halsey's music
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com/{artist}/album"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves all songs from the database and returns them in the response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "halsey-lyric-snippets.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
